caseStudy.title: How it works in practice
caseStudy.subtitle: You upload your poster design, and we handle production, sales, and shipping. You watch your balance — withdraw whenever you want.

upload.title: Upload .PSD design in 5 minutes
upload.description: Add file and title. System automatically creates previews and mockups.

acceptance.title: Acceptance
acceptance.description: We check quality and copyright. After acceptance, product is available in store 24/7.

sales.title: Sales and fulfillment
sales.description: We forward orders to printing and shipping. You don't have to do anything.

payout.title: Balance and payout
payout.description: Earnings first go to "Pending" (for return period), then to "Available". Withdraw on demand, max 1x/month.

mockups.cta: See your work on customers' walls

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the platform

fee.q: Do I have to pay to add a design?
fee.a: No! Joining the platform and adding projects is completely free. You only pay when you earn – we take a commission from sales (30% of final price). No hidden fees, no monthly subscriptions.

payout.a: When a customer buys your poster, commission first goes to "Pending" balance (for potential returns – usually 14 days). Then amount moves to "Available" balance and you can request payout, maximum once a month. We process transfer within 48 hours.

printing.a: We do! We partner with European printers that produce premium quality posters (200g/m²). When customer places order, we automatically forward file for printing and shipping. You don't have to do anything – sleep peacefully while we fulfill orders.

returns.q: What if customer returns the poster?
returns.a: We handle all returns and complaints. If customer returns product during return period, we simply cancel your commission from that order. You don't need to worry or contact customer – everything is on our side.

removal.a: Yes, anytime. You have full control over your projects in designer panel. You can edit, deactivate or completely remove them from store. If you deactivate project, it won't be visible to customers, but you'll keep sales history.

fileSize.q: How large files can I upload?
fileSize.a: Since we want to provide best print quality for our customers, file size limit is maximally large for good quality .PSD files - 500 MB. We recommend PSD, AI, PNG or TIFF formats in high resolution (minimum 300 DPI). Better file quality means better print. Our system automatically verifies quality and lets you know if something needs improvement.
